readable.title: 2824401212_8da8ab99d6
readable.content: A crowd of people socializing at night . A girl in an orange jacket talks on the phone while another girl smokes . A woman in an orange jacket is talking on her cellphone . A woman wearing orange stands in a crowd and talks on the phone . The woman in orange talks on a cellphone whist standing in front of the woman who is smoking a cigarette .
